sentences.sentence: Customers plunge their tootsies into a tank filled with tiny fish that nibble off dead skin, resulting in softer feet.
sentences.translation: 顾客们将他们的脚浸入一个装满小鱼的水池，让那些小鱼吃掉脚部死皮，得到的是一双更加柔软的脚。

sentences.sentence: Women are turning to cosmetic surgery on their tootsies in the US just so that they can cram their feet into the latest designer heels, the Daily Mail of London reported.
sentences.translation: 据英国《每日邮报》报道，一股"足部整容"风潮在美国女性中间流行开来，她们如此"虐待"自己的脚只是为了能穿上最新一季的名牌高跟鞋。
